name: ELIAN ► STYLISH EDITOR (v1.4.3)
description: Style for the the edit style window. (Also Style INSTALL window) The companion of my style 104406 If you want the menu for the whole FF try my style 104409
additional_info: (All appologies for my english) I hate light UIs. I REALLY HATE THEM. So, this is my Stylish edit window, inspired in the Firefox's built in Inspector. Since i started, it pass throught different variants, but it hasn't finished. Now, i finnished at all, i uploaded here. Hope you like it. DARK MINIMAL CUSTOM MENUS TOP BARS ON SINGLE LINE UPDATE URL NO ANNOYING, RESIZABLE & ANIMATED ERRORS RESIZABLE & ANIMATED Things you should know: • TESTED in FF 28; 31; 32; 38; 40.0a2; 41.0a2 (en-US locales) • Stylish version 1.4.3 (I EXPLICITLY express that itsn't for newly Stylish version and i will not update. SO... ...review it wisely) • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • I don't use Chrome. • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES, please. Changelog: ► 2014-09-09 • A small fix on the NAME, TAG an URL HEIGHT textboxes on windows 8.1. ► 2014-09-06 • Style for menus don't affect global FF menus ► 2014-09-03 • Moved INSERT, WRAP LINES and UPDATE URL into the row of NAME and TAG. • Restilized INSERT and WRAP LINES buttons. • Expandable UPDATE URL when focused. • Botton button bar with less height. ► 2014-08-25 • Added "wrap lines" couse in FF 31 it works. (In FF 28 no work for me) If you use FF28 you should put display none to the "Wrap lines" and adjust the margin (LEFT) to the Update URL. • Fixed context menu in NAME and TAG textboxes for FF31. • Some changes in the ERROR. ► 2014-08-15 ►►► First Release.

discussions.name: Works in Stylish 1.4.3, not in Stylish 2.0
Please highlight the pointed context menu row on mouseover
